title: SCTIMST Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Project Research Scientist II Posts
description: The Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Research Scientist II Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation and Ph.D. can apply for the SCTIMST Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the ed...
